title: nIrajAkSi kAmAkSi
sahitya:
nIrajAkSi kAmAkSi nIrada cikurE tripurE


anupallavi

 shAradA ramA nayanE sArasa candrAnanE vArijapAdE varadE tAraya mAm tatvapadE


caraNam   gaurI hindOLa dyuti hIra maNimayAbharaNE shauri virinci vinuta shiva shaktimaya navAvaraNE 
nArImaNyAdyarccita nava nAdAntah karaNE sUrijana samsEvita sundara guruguha karaNE
